LightningComponentBundle.description: Application form used to apply for access to Aa-registret.

property.name: recordId
property.label: Record Id
property.description: Makes component aware of the page's record id

property.name: linkToDataElements
property.label: Data elements URL
property.description: The URL for the data element file.

property.name: linkToTermsOfUse
property.label: Terms of use URL
property.description: The URL for the terms of use document.
